title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 372.13 - New york state constitution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 372.13 - New york state constitution

State Regulations

For the purposes of article 16, section 5 of the New York

State Constitution, any payments made pursuant to the excess benefit plan shall
be considered part of a pension payable to officers and employees of the State
and it's subdivisions and agencies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
372.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
